title: Movie Project
desc: Developed a movie management system using Spring Boot and MongoDB. Designed RESTful APIs for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting movie data. Integrated Spring Data MongoDB for efficient NoSQL data handling.

title: Student Management System
desc: Developed a Student Management System using Java Collections (ArrayList) for data storage. Implemented features to add, update, delete, and search student records by roll number. Designed a menu-driven console interface for user interaction.

title: TutorTracker
desc: Developed an Android app using Java and Firebase Realtime Database. Enables lecturers to manage appointments, schedules, and announcements with students. Provides real-time synchronization of data for efficient management of academic activities.

title: Pneumonia Detection System
desc: Developed a deep learning-based pneumonia detection system using transfer learning with a pre-trained DenseNet-169 model, fine-tuned on lung X-ray images for accurate classification. Implemented using PyTorch for model development and Tkinter for GUI.

title: Attendance using Face Recognition
desc: Developed an attendance system using DeepFace library with the Facenet model for face recognition. Integrated OpenCV for video frame capture and real-time face recognition. Updated student attendance in the database and exported records to an Excel sheet.
